overview: Gorgeous parolee Roman Todd just got out of prison and is at loose ends. With no friends or family left in New England, the sexy stud tries hitchhiking to California, and is soon picked up by older, good samaritan Rodney Steele. When nurturing Rodney offers to let the young bad boy stay at his place, Roman eagerly agrees. But Rodney is not the sweet older man he seems to be, and Roman soon discovers he is nothing more than sexual prey for the lonely, twisted Rodney. Starring Roman Todd, Rodney Steele, Alex Chandler, Shane Omen.
tagline: When the predator becomes the prey...
title: The Hitchhiker
